result.eng: A leaflet in Irish is available on request.
result.ga: Tá bileog as Gaeilge le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.orig: Tá bileog as Gaeilge le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.html: Tá bileog as Gaeilge le fáil ach í a iarraidhA leaflet in Irish is available on request.
result.ponchtml: Tá bileog as Gaeilge le fáil aċ í a iarraiḋA leaflet in Irish is available on request.

result.eng: An information leaflet is available at request.
result.ga: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.orig: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.html: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidhAn information leaflet is available at request.
result.ponchtml: Tá bileog eolais le fáil aċ í a iarraiḋAn information leaflet is available at request.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.orig: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.html: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i MeiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaistil sé ċun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i MeiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
